affective.core

Class EmbeddingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • affective.core.EmbeddingHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EmbeddingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used for handling word vector or embeddings stored in zgipped files with format: emb1 tab emb2 tab ..word.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fjb11@students.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
